name: Fool's Light
description:
Fool's Light is a short visual novel game about friendships, mysteries and overcoming the life obstacles. Follow a young rookie detective Reed try to solve the case of a mysterious villain wielding the power of illusions.

WARNINGS:
- flashing images
- graphic description of violence (moderate; no pictures included)
- adult language

It's my first ever visual novel that I've done as a project for my university. I got really close with all of the characters and the whole thing that I ended up improving it a little bit and show it to the world!

Email me your feedback on lolisa.151@gmail.com or @reedthetective on twitter.
